topic.title: The alien videos at /17WkbiBGo7a32cJYwsMhNhkwBY8rkgeaf2/
topic.body: Anyone been able to see these? I have visited several times and the videos do not load. If there are some with audio, I can do reverse speech credibility checking. Can they be posted to ZeroUp too?

topic.title: ZeroNet among the best (nice work)
topic.body:
I have played with I2P, Tor and a few others. I like ZeroNet because of it's simplicity. I have tried to give ZeroNet a bit of publicity before 80 people on a LinkedIn profile. 

I2P and Tor have a downside in that you have to run a web server to host your files and your computer must always be on. Tor has a large user base.

I hope ZeroNet gets a major boost in the number of those using it. 

How do those who use it give it publicity? Anyone dared to talk about it on Gab or Fascist Book?

1623722854_1ByyvGdKSdKTywR6F8tmFAk3RsWUH.body: I showed that report to my friends. Remarks were interesting but real evidence needed. That audio (forward speech) is claimed to be genuine by the deceased author.  I knew the guy before he vanished. All he's doing is using reverse speech to check if the recording is genuine. Given his belief system, it is.

1624029155_1LqdvKDPZkkuq472J2ZdANDSd1JNK.body: Impressive. I didn't know you could do that with IPFS.

1624135580_1FvnwahjrXUdDfwfKtA16WL1Uoqee.body: there is a delete button for files that look dodgy. that's got to be a plus.
